A/B testing Report

A/B testing is a method that is used to compare two versions of a variable, such as a product or marketing campaign, to determine which one performs better. It is a crucial skill in Data Science and is often used by organizations to make informed decisions about optimizing their products or marketing campaigns to maximize revenue and profit.
